product_name: Native Eyewear Clara Polarized Sunglasses - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Practical but stylish, The Native Eyewear Clara polarized sunglasses give your outfit its finishing touch, while also cutting glare and protecting your eyes from the sun. Snow and Flamingo frames feature polarized copper lenses that are ideal for moderate sunlight. Maple Tort frames feature polarized brown lenses that are ideal for bright sunlight. Black Lime Burst and Iron frames both feature polarized gray lenses and are ideal for extremely bright sunlight. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight frames are flexible and durable enough to withstand high-velocity collisions; they also endure extreme highs and lows in temperature. Snap-Back(TM) Interchange lens system lets you switch lenses to accommodate a variety of light conditions and activities; additional lenses not included. Nonslip nose pads; cam-action hinges; soft protective pouch included that doubles as a cleaning cloth. The Native Eyewear Clara polarized sunglasses offer large coverage and are best suited for extra small profiles. Closeout.
short_description: Practical but stylish, The Native Eyewear Clara polarized sunglasses give your outfit its finishing touch, while also cutting glare and protecting your eyes from the sun.
